title: This Week's Top Stories - The GOP's Supreme Court Hypocrisy & Trump's Anti-Democracy Escalation
itunes:title: This Week's Top Stories - The GOP's Supreme Court Hypocrisy & Trump's Anti-Democracy Escalation
description:
Ruth Bader Ginsburg's death leads to rank hypocrisy from the GOP, and President Trump amps up his war against mail-in voting while refusing to honor an electoral defeat.
